entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

This software allows right-click, copy, cut, and paste functionality on all websites. It has a simple interface and is easy to use. You can copy any content, whether itâ€™s text, images, or other media.

entry.title: Hide Mouse Cursor
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$0.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $0.99]ï¼‰

Application Description

This app is a tool designed for users to hide the mouse cursor, which is particularly suitable for full-screen presentations, video playback or games, allowing users to focus on the content without being disturbed by the cursor, including one-click hiding/showing the cursor, shortcut key support, and custom settings.

entry.title: Meitu-AI Photo Editor & Design
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Yearly Auto-renew Meitu SVIPï¼š$84.99 â†’ $29.99 [$29.99 ~ $84.99]

Application Description

Meitu is the simplest image processing tool that can quickly achieve professional-level photo editing effects. AI tools are constantly updated, and everyone can make good pictures! === AI image modification, intelligent design without effort === [AI Cutout] Efficient in all categories, 3s background removal, one-click change of background color/local pictures [AI Remover] One-click removal of redundant text, passers-by, skin acne spots, complex backgrounds, etc., without leaving any traces! [AI Enhancer] Ultra-clear image quality rebirth, say goodbye to poor image quality [AI Background Change] Enter keywords, AI generates product and portrait scene pictures [AI Expand] Freely expand the picture frame, intelligently fill the picture, and the composition does not need to be cropped! [AI Smart Selection] Any element can be freely moved, scaled, copied, redrawn, eliminated, and adjusted in color... ===Meitu Batch Editor, efficient and higher quality=== Import hundreds of pictures at a time, batch cut out pictures to change backgrounds, make them clear, add watermarks, crop and change sizes, compress and convert formats, etc., without repeated operations, efficient and refined! ===Poster design, change pictures and words with one click=== Massive high-quality templates cover e-commerce, administrative office, new media, WeChat and many other scenarios. ===Puzzle splicing, creative layout=== Seamless, horizontal and vertical, four-grid, nine-grid, love, triangle and many other puzzle styles, you can also freely assemble, social more colorful! ===Basic picture editing, simple and outstanding=== [Add text] [Crop, rotate, correct, and adjust size] [Dimming, color adjustment, and filter][Border stickers] [Brush] ===Medical-grade portrait beauty, high-definition natural face=== [One-click beauty and whitening] [Facial reshaping] [Face slimming, body slimming, height increase] [Eye and Teeth Refinement] â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€” [Meitu computer version SVIP automatic renewal service statement] [Meitu computer SVIP rights] Experience massive materials, personalized functions, and more refreshing without ads. [Subscription period] Meitu Computer SVIP - Continuous Monthly Subscription: Subscription period of 1 month Meitu PC SVIP - Continuous Season: Subscription period of 3 months Meitu PC SVIP - Consecutive Yearly Subscription: Subscription period of 12 months [Subscription price] The iAP application information shall prevail. For example, continuous monthly subscription products are 20 yuan per month; continuous seasonal subscription products are 50 yuan per quarter; continuous annual subscription products are 168 yuan per year. [Payment] After the user confirms the purchase and pays, it will be charged to the iTunes account. [Renewal] "Continuous monthly/quarterly/yearly" products are auto-renewable products, and your iTunes account will be charged after confirming the purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription. Within 24 hours before your subscription period expires, Apple will automatically deduct the fee from your iTunes account, and the membership validity period will be automatically extended by one period after success. [Cancel renewal] If you want to cancel the automatic renewal, please manually go to "Settings" on your iPhone - click "Apple ID", select to enter the "Subscription" page, and select "Meitu SVIP" to cancel the subscription. [Free Trial] Renew the subscription during the free trial period to cancel the renewal, and the free trial rights will not be recovered from the user, and the user can try it until the trial period ends. ==Related Agreement== Membership Service Agreement: https://pc.meitu.com/agreement Privacy Policy Address: https://pc.meitu.com/legal-agreement?type=pc

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Meitu-AI Photo Editor & Design
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Monthly Auto-renew Meitu SVIPï¼š$12.49 â†’ $3.99 [$3.99 ~ $12.49]

Application Description

Meitu is the simplest image processing tool that can quickly achieve professional-level photo editing effects. AI tools are constantly updated, and everyone can make good pictures! === AI image modification, intelligent design without effort === [AI Cutout] Efficient in all categories, 3s background removal, one-click change of background color/local pictures [AI Remover] One-click removal of redundant text, passers-by, skin acne spots, complex backgrounds, etc., without leaving any traces! [AI Enhancer] Ultra-clear image quality rebirth, say goodbye to poor image quality [AI Background Change] Enter keywords, AI generates product and portrait scene pictures [AI Expand] Freely expand the picture frame, intelligently fill the picture, and the composition does not need to be cropped! [AI Smart Selection] Any element can be freely moved, scaled, copied, redrawn, eliminated, and adjusted in color... ===Meitu Batch Editor, efficient and higher quality=== Import hundreds of pictures at a time, batch cut out pictures to change backgrounds, make them clear, add watermarks, crop and change sizes, compress and convert formats, etc., without repeated operations, efficient and refined! ===Poster design, change pictures and words with one click=== Massive high-quality templates cover e-commerce, administrative office, new media, WeChat and many other scenarios. ===Puzzle splicing, creative layout=== Seamless, horizontal and vertical, four-grid, nine-grid, love, triangle and many other puzzle styles, you can also freely assemble, social more colorful! ===Basic picture editing, simple and outstanding=== [Add text] [Crop, rotate, correct, and adjust size] [Dimming, color adjustment, and filter][Border stickers] [Brush] ===Medical-grade portrait beauty, high-definition natural face=== [One-click beauty and whitening] [Facial reshaping] [Face slimming, body slimming, height increase] [Eye and Teeth Refinement] â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€” [Meitu computer version SVIP automatic renewal service statement] [Meitu computer SVIP rights] Experience massive materials, personalized functions, and more refreshing without ads. [Subscription period] Meitu Computer SVIP - Continuous Monthly Subscription: Subscription period of 1 month Meitu PC SVIP - Continuous Season: Subscription period of 3 months Meitu PC SVIP - Consecutive Yearly Subscription: Subscription period of 12 months [Subscription price] The iAP application information shall prevail. For example, continuous monthly subscription products are 20 yuan per month; continuous seasonal subscription products are 50 yuan per quarter; continuous annual subscription products are 168 yuan per year. [Payment] After the user confirms the purchase and pays, it will be charged to the iTunes account. [Renewal] "Continuous monthly/quarterly/yearly" products are auto-renewable products, and your iTunes account will be charged after confirming the purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription. Within 24 hours before your subscription period expires, Apple will automatically deduct the fee from your iTunes account, and the membership validity period will be automatically extended by one period after success. [Cancel renewal] If you want to cancel the automatic renewal, please manually go to "Settings" on your iPhone - click "Apple ID", select to enter the "Subscription" page, and select "Meitu SVIP" to cancel the subscription. [Free Trial] Renew the subscription during the free trial period to cancel the renewal, and the free trial rights will not be recovered from the user, and the user can try it until the trial period ends. ==Related Agreement== Membership Service Agreement: https://pc.meitu.com/agreement Privacy Policy Address: https://pc.meitu.com/legal-agreement?type=pc

entry.title: DM1 - The Drum Machine
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$8.99 â†’ $5.99 [$5.99 ~ $8.99]ï¼‰

Application Description

Easy and fast to use, loaded with 154 superb electronic drum kits and beautiful hyper-realistic graphics, DM1 has been designed for a lot of instant fun.â€¨ With Midi In & out, DM1 is ready to fit your digital audio workstation. As electronic musicians ourselves, we, at Fingerlab, have developed DM1 with the intention of delivering the perfect mix between fun playability and powerful sonic capacities. We always keep in mind the importance of a beautiful design with the right balance of powerful abilities while avoiding clumsy, overbusy interfaces. Check our 154 electronic drum kits. 42 classic vintage drum kits plus 112 in-house produced electronic kits, edited and mastered at Fingerlab professional studio. Add easily bass and melody to your beats with the instrument mode. DM1 offers 5 main sections: 1 - THE STEP SEQUENCER Just turn on and off steps in your sequence to create cool beats, or unexpected rhythms! 2 - THE DRUM PADS simply lets you play and record the beat that tickles your fingers on the keyboard. No need to be a first-class drummer, automatic quantize does the work for you. 3 - THE MIXER for quick and subtle sound mixing of your drum kits. Featuring settings for volume, pitch, pan, sample length, custom drum kit element for each channel, mute and solo mode. 4 - THE FX TRACKPADS a creative duo of FX trackpads to distort, modulate and transform your beats. The effects include: Overdrive, Delay, Reverb, Envelope filter, Phaser, Dub Delay, Formant, Texturizer, Robotizer, Dalek, Resonant Filter, Compressor & Noise Gate. 5 - THE SONG COMPOSER allows you to quickly make a song with the beat patterns you have created. Just drag and drop the patterns onto the timeline. Fast and easy. DM1 for OSX is fully compatible with DM1 for iPad, you can share files between them. Specifications: â€¢ DM1 The Drum Machine for iPad winner Apple design Award 2012 â€¢ Fullscreen Retina Display â€¢ Smart ergonomy for fast creativity and fun â€¢ 154 vintage and produced drum kits, mastered at in-house Fingerlab Sound Studios â€¢ Instrument mode with 6 instruments available (Piano, Korg MicroPreset, Cello, Clavinet, Marimba and MiniLogue) â€¢ Import your samples and create your own kits â€¢ Mixer with pitch, length and level rotary controls, pan controls, and custom drum kit per channel â€¢ Automation Panel for a precise and intuitive control of any Mixer parameter over time â€¢ Automation recording for FXs â€¢ FX Trackpad for real-time sonic destruction and multi-FX â€¢ Time signatures â€¢ The Randomizer tool â€¢ Extra fast drum kit loading â€¢ Playable pattern selection for extra creativity â€¢ Mode song with intuitive editing â€¢ High-quality export â€¢ Separated tracks and AAC encoding export options â€¢ Full Midi Implementation â€¢ Import & Export your song project Watch DM1 video trailer on YouTube Fingerlab's channel: http://www.youtube.com/fingerlab Feel free to let us know what you think and what you'd like to see in the next DM1 update. Enjoy! Watch us : vimeo.com/â€‹fingerlab Visit us : fingerlab.net Follow us : twitter.com/â€‹fingerlab Contact us : contact@fingerlab.net Powered by Fingerlab http://www.fingerlab.net

entry.title: Whisk
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Whiskï¼š$29.99 â†’ $0.00 [$0.00 ~ $29.99]

Application Description

Whisk is a lightweight HTML and PHP editor with a live preview that updates as you type. *** Whiskâ€™s free download includes 14-day fully functional trial and document viewer mode. An In-App Purchases is available to unlock the full edition, with discounts for previous owners. *** Whisk is an essential app in your toolkit for HTML, PHP, CSS, and Javascript programming. It is great for learning web development, testing snippets of code, or building entire web pages. Whiskâ€™s integrated preview pane displays the web page live as you type. Whisk breaks the tedious cycle of writing HTML, saving the file, then reloading and viewing the page in the browser. Combining the writing phase with the viewing phase clarifies the effects of your changes and speeds up the overall process of making a web page. W3C-based validation will red-underline any mistakes. It uses the same rendering engine found in Safari, so it is not only standards compliant, but also very fast. =================== Whisk is the app previously known as HyperEdit! For a comprehensive list of whatâ€™s new, visit: https://tumult.com/whisk/whats-new/2.6/ Macworld rating (Nov 2004): 4.5 mice =================== Use Whisk For: â€¢ Crafting HTML to make sure it looks exactly as you want it â€¢ Testing and executing PHP code â€¢ Writing blog posts, forum entries, or rich emails â€¢ Interactively trying out CSS â€¢ Running and debugging JavaScript â€¢ And creating whole websites Main Features: â€¢ Preview pane quickly renders HTML and PHP as typed, using the same engine as Safari â€¢ Watched Files automatically (or manually) determine when files are changed and will reload the web preview (file access permissions required) â€¢ Live HTML W3C-based validation shows errors and highlights problem tags with a red underline â€¢ Preview to other browsers or the Hype Reflect app on iOS â€¢ Web inspector/console/dev tools access â€¢ Customizable syntax highlighting coloring â€¢ Reusable code snippets and color swatches â€¢ Scroll sync keeps can keep the editor and preview at similar spots â€¢ View HTML source code generated by the PHP engine â€¢ Attach Style Sheets for viewing how blog posts/markup will look with external styling Because We Love the Mac: â€¢ Written in Cocoa exclusively as a macOS app (supports 10.12 through macOS 14 Sonoma) â€¢ Adopts new macOS features and is gorgeous in Light and Dark modes â€¢ It runs natively as a Universal app on Intel and Apple Silicon Macs =================== Download Whisk now and start your free trial! Documentation is available on Whiskâ€™s website.
